meanings.sent1: The abstruse math problem left the students puzzled.
meanings.sent2: The professor's lecture on quantum physics was too abstruse for most of the class.
meanings.sent3: Trying to decipher the abstruse instructions for assembling the furniture was like solving a mystery.
meanings.sent4: The abstruse concept of time travel in the movie made my head spin.
meanings.sent5: The abstruse language used in the legal document made it nearly impossible to grasp.

meanings.sent1: The treasure map led them to an abstruse cave deep in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The writer's abstruse references to ancient mythology confused many readers.
meanings.sent3: The cat's abstruse hiding spot behind the curtains made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The truth was an abstruse puzzle waiting to be unraveled.
meanings.sent5: The secret society had an abstruse initiation ritual known only to its members.
